supportDesc.support: Fragments 1-13 (in mm), (1) 25 x 61, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (2) 45 x 38, (A) 3 lines, left margin, (B) 3 lines, right margin, (3) 46 x 14, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (4) 50 x 39, (A) 4 lines, top margin, (B) 2 lines, top margin (?), (5) 50 x 25, (A) 6 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (6) 30 x 39, (A) 3 lines, right margin, (B) blank, (7) 27 x 48, (A) 2 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (8) 38 x 41, (A) 4 lines, left margin, (B) 4 lines, right margin, (9) 43 x 50, (A) 2 lines, top margin, (B) blank, (10) 42 x 45, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (11) 61 x 59, (A) 2 lines, top bottom margins, (B) 4 lines, no margins, (12) 70 x 33, (A) 7 lines, top margin, (B) 2 lines, no margins, (13) 65 x 35, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) 6 lines, no margins
